definition: to communicate with the spirits/psychic/(ears) sensitive/(information) accurate
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Maarten: And then on "Channeled Messages by Mike Quinsey".
sentences.chinese: 然后后缀是“由麦克通灵”。

sentences.english: Have you ever played with horoscopes or Ouija boards?
sentences.chinese: 你玩过天宫图或通灵游戏吗？

sentences.english: This was published in our first transcriptions of live channelling.
sentences.chinese: 这发表在我们第一本现场通灵的抄本里。

sentences.english: M-25.2. Certainly there are many "psychic" powers that are clearly in line with this course.
sentences.chinese: 当然也有不少“通灵”能力与本课程的精神相符。

sentences.english: Thus began Janes channeling of Seth.
sentences.chinese: 这样，简开始为赛斯通灵。

sentences.english: We contribute Cloverleaf channelings to them.
sentences.chinese: 我们立体式通灵有助于他们。

definition: to ward off evil spirits/mythical lion-like animal that wards off evil (also called 貔貅[pi2 xiu1])

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
